...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED...

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN NORMAN HAS CANCELLED THE WINTER
WEATHER ADVISORY. 

PRECIPITATION HAS MOSTLY ENDED THIS AFTERNOON. WHILE PATCHY FREEZING
DRIZZLE AND OR FREEZING FOG WILL REMAIN POSSIBLE...SUBSTANTIAL
ACCUMULATIONS OF ICE AND SLEET ARE NO LONGER ANTICIPATED THROUGH
THE REST OF TONIGHT.

ANOTHER ROUND OF FREEZING RAIN AND SLEET IS POISED TO BEGIN FRIDAY
MORNING. A NEW WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL LIKELY BE NEEDED
LATER TODAY OR TONIGHT...AS ACCUMULATING ICE WILL BE POSSIBLE
ONCE AGAIN FRIDAY INTO FRIDAY NIGHT.

* MAIN IMPACT: FREEZING DRIZZLE AND VERY LIGHT FREEZING RAIN MAY
